text:
It's only because
we work together,

that we can ensure that
every individual can
be the best that they can be.

Because discussion,
deliberation, and debate

are core to what we
do at the School.

You're going to learn
and begin to understand

what that case method, teaching,
and learning is all about.

It's quite different, but if
you listen and learn, work hard,

invest in this community,
you will do great.

Hard work with
humility for humanity--

it's not always going
to be comfortable.

In fact, you're going
to be challenged.

You're going to
be uncomfortable,

you're going to get
frustrated at times.

But that's what
learning is all about.

It's all about getting
comfortable being uncomfortable.

Comfortable being pushed,
being challenged on things
you thought you knew.

You're going to come out of
those discussions inspired
and invigorated.

You're going to
develop a resilience

to have those conversations,
to push through disagreement,

and to come out the other
side a smarter, better

person, because
you're going to learn

from each other
every single day.
Break the ice yourself.

Every single person is
in the same exact boat.

And I promise you, a simple
ask goes a really long way.
Find your own balance.

Time here is so limited, so it's
important to do the things that
make this place so special.

Act with integrity,
empathy, and humility.

We want you not just to learn
what we're teaching you here,
but to learn how to learn.

We want you not to
just be educated

in terms of your knowledge, but
to be educated for judgment.
